article: It is summer vacation and school is closed. Children don't need to study  _  exams. During the summer vacation, many children stay at home to  _  TV, eat delicious food and play with  _  friends. Some take part in a neighborhood program, go to  _  museums or go camping. A camp is a summer vacation place for  _  . They can go swimming, climb mountains, go to the beach or go hiking. Now, there are  _  camps. They are not expensive. At these camps, children learn  _  to use computers. Most children enjoy playing computer games. At the computer camps, they can learn some things about the computer,  _  friends and talk about some things  _  their friends. If you don't have a plan yet, a computer camp should be a  _  choice .
